sentences.sContent: All the guests paid her extravagant compliments.
sentences.sCn: 所有客人都对她赞不绝口。

sentences.sContent: Being compared to Abba is a great compliment.
sentences.sCn: 能和阿巴乐队相提并论是极大的赞誉。

synos.tran: 恭维；称赞；问候；致意；道贺

phrases.pCn: 言不由衷(或挖苦人)的恭维话

remMethod.val: com+pli(充满)+ment→满口称赞之词→称赞

trans.tranOther: a remark that shows you admire someone or something
to say something nice to someone in order to praise them
